title: Anti-Racist Education Design Through Affect-Based Reflective Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of human rights concepts and introductory awareness of social structures
context.additional_context: Availability of collaborative tools and emotion-tracking platforms using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and express diverse emotional responses related to racism.
Learners can analyze the historical and social contexts of systemic racism by connecting them to emotional case studies.
Learners can present concrete action plans for anti-racism practices as project deliverables.

resources: Digital Archive Tool for Emotional Documentation
Group Collaboration Platform (Padlet, Google Workspace, etc.)
Educational Resources for Diverse Racial and Cultural Backgrounds

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
